document_data.name: ''Ring of Cloaked Wizardry''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rings of cloaked wizardry''''' were special rings found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate, whose enchantments were difficult to detect by magical means.{{Cite dragon/179/Wonders of the Land of Fate}}
document_data.Powers: These rings were similar to any other magic ring found on [[Toril|Al-Toril]] save for the fact that casting ''[[detect magic]]'' did not reveal that the ring was in fact magical. Spells such as ''[[identify]]'' and ''[[legend lore]]'' worked normally when used on a ''ring of cloaked wizardry''.
